name: PDF, Save and Send
short_description:
Saving a PDF and sending it "in one go". 

"PDF, Save and Send" is a small extension for LibreOffice and OpenOffice which combines two regular functions in one. 

In text document, a spreadsheet or a presentation one can click a button or use the menu entry and then the current version document is exported to a pdf-file with the same filename in the current directory. And directly after saving it starts the default mail-client with a new email with the pdf-file as attachment.

It works und Linux and Windows (and probably OSX, BSD as well) with the current versions of LibreOffice and OpenOffice.
summary: "PDF, Save and Send" is an extension for LibreOffice and Open Office
